tool_description: Multi-domain NER system to recognize and classify biomedical entities according to your custom classification
name: zero-shot NER
title: zero-shot NER

api_list.name: predict
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zero-shot-ner.p.rapidapi.com/predict"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zero-shot-ner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://zero-shot-ner.p.rapidapi.com/predict"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zero-shot-ner.p.rapidapi.com"
